name: Stack Three FRVR - Blast Cubes
description:
A ton of smiling colored cubes is coming to fill the puzzle board and make a big mess of bricks! It’s time to use your block arranging skills to clear the level and solve the puzzle. Simply pick an incoming tile, drop it into the grid and try to match 3 blocks from the same color in order to blast them and keep the board free! Smash all those cubes!

Stack Three FRVR Features:
- Addictive gameplay that mixes a classic block arranging experience, an incredibly fun cube dropping mechanic and the satisfying challenge of blasting tons of colored cubes!
- Get new skins for these smiling tiles! Colorful and pleasant graphics that will help you relax in those 5 mins of spare time.
- Endless hours of fun! There’s NO LIVES MODE and there are no level limits. It’s up to you and your logic to reach the end of this new block puzzle.
- No loading screens! Jump straight to fit blocks or stack cubes and don’t wait to blast them all!


Stack Three FRVR is a new block puzzle game that offers a challenging match 3 experience with a classic brick dropping mechanic! Feel the fun of blasting colored cubes and enjoy the challenge of arranging all the bricks and filling every single spot of the puzzle grid.
But don’t worry! Stack Three FRVR is a truly relaxing puzzle game where there’s no lives mode. Play as much as you want! Moves are not limited, squeeze your brain with hours of block bursting fun and pop the cubes wisely! You just have to be careful of the color of the block and make sure that you’re matching 3 o more bricks to get combos and beat your highscore!

StackThree works in several directions, and as long as you have a sharp eye and quick hand, you'll keep the board clear enough to accommodate what's incoming. If you haven't placed the pieces before they reach the right side of the screen, they'll start filling the board randomly.

Collect coins while you exercise your brain and use them to unlock new cubes and tiles to drop. Change the look of those smiling jewels and discover a fresh new brainteaser to play, although the goal is still the same: Match three colors across or down to clear space on the board and keep racking up points.

Playable in airplane mode, without data connection. No 4G or Wi-Fi required. It’s the perfect block matching game for a short period of refreshing brain training on the bus, at school or in the office. Easy to cube arranging game for all ages and all kind of tablets and phones. It runs smoothly both on high-grade smartphones and low-performing devices.

Stack Three FRVR is a low storage game, you don’t need more than 30 MB to play! This block blasting game only focuses on giving you a truly fun experience in a low mb game size for free. It’s an easy to play cube dropping game with incredibly simple and addictive controls, so both young and adults can have fun. Play online or offline, since you don’t need an internet connection to play this car puzzle game. And relax, you can play as much as you want, there’s no time limit!
